metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8416 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A tampering vulnerability exists when .NET Core improperly handles specially crafted files, aka ".NET Core Tampering Vulnerability." This affects .NET Core 2.1.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> similar code exists in mono, need to see if affected

criterions.comment: mono: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
mono-reference-assemblies: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
